name: Rosette and Words
description: Rosette and Words is a crossword game puzzle where you must find words in a board full of letter tiles. Collect beautiful rosettes and make new ones!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x86/x64 Processor: Intel Pentium D 830 (2* 3000) or equivalent / AMD Athlon 64 4000+ (2600) or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (256 MB) / Radeon HD 2400 PRO (256 MB) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space
